snippet.title: MotoGP™ 18 Announcement Trailer
snippet.description: MotoGP™ 18 will be out on the 7th of June on PS4, Xbox One, Steam/PC and shortly after Nintendo Switch. Get ready to fire up the engines with all the official content from the 2018 MotoGP™ season, for the most immersive and realistic MotoGP™ experience ever!
